Package org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.viewfetcher

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColumnValueCalculator
    a class which calculates the value of a column in a row based on other values in the same row
    PropertyDescription
    these are indexed in the map by their hashCode() / equals() functions, so be sure to make those meaningful
    ViewFetcher
    a generic datasource for fetching a view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmpPostgresDialect  
    ColumnValuesCacher
    a class which holds the cached i18n values for a (model, field)
    ColumnValueTranslator
    a column-in-a-view translator which does a translateText() call on the input for its outputs
    DatabaseViewFetcher
    a ViewFetcher for fetching data from a real database, either with or without postprocessing
    DelegResultSet
    A base delegating implementation of ResultSet.
    DgEditorPropertyDescription
    IMMUTABLEclass holding the data necessary reading the i18n value of a property translated through DG_EDITOR entries
    NEVER EVER MAKE THIS CLASS MUTABLE OR CONTAIN MUTABLE FIELDS
    The class fetches its data from a view which has rows of the form (activity_id, text, locale)
    GeneratedPropertyDescription
    generates a column's value for a row on an one-by-one basis, based on the values on the same row
    I18nDatabaseViewFetcher
    fetches a view which contains internationalized String columns; feeds to the consumer the query result (plus translated values)
    I18nViewColumnDescription
    a description of a translatable column of a view which should be overwritten
    I18nViewDescription
    description of an i18n view: contains a description of all the columns which should be overridden by the translation
    InternationalizedModelDescription
    class holding the description of the i18n fields from a Hibernate model (identified by class name) the constructor scans the Hibernate configuration and reflects on the class name
    InternationalizedPropertyDescription
    IMMUTABLEclass holding the data necessary reading the i18n value of a property of a Translatable model
    NEVER EVER MAKE THIS CLASS MUTABLE OR CONTAIN MUTABLE FIELDS there are two sources for fetching a translated value:
    1.
    InternationalizedViewsRepository
    repository class holding the configuration for all the internationalized views' i18n columns
    InternationalizedViewsRepository.AgreementTitleCodeCalculator
    class which computes the title_code of an agreement
    RawDatabaseViewFetcher
    a ViewFetcher which rawly fetches data from a view/table
    RsInfo
    a class which encapsulates a ResultSet and its generated statement and which closes them both
    SimpleColumnValueCalculator
    simple delegating ColumnValueCalculator which strips the common stuff off the (one-liner) concrete classes
    SQLUtils
